sector.narrative: Digital learning materials and ICT in education
Education analyses including OOSCI, Education Sector Analyses, etc.
Provision of (formal and non-formal) primary education (including in temporary learning spaces)
Sanitation and hygiene - institutions (schools, health care facilities, ECD centres) including menstrual hygiene management
System strengthening - responsiveness of education/training system to the labour market

title.narrative: Description of UNICEF programming approach framework at the country level with Common Country Assessments (CCAs) providing the equivalence of pre project appraisals

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Le systeme educatif est capable de limiter l?abandon et l?echec scolaires en utilisant une approche participative decentralisee,centree sur l?enfant (filles et garcons) et sur l?amelioration de la qualite de l?education.

description.narrative: The design of a school dropout prevention programme and a 2nd chance programme in Tunisia have been initiated in 2018 and conditions have been established to start the first year of piloting in 2019. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:07/01/2019
